Description: Fragment of East Greek pottery handle with rotelle at top; cream slip; outsides of handle flanged; central double ridge on rotelle; exterior: rotelle and flanges glazed; red in centre; on flanges added white wavy lines with alternating added red and black centres and dots; on rotelle white dotted circles; inside reserved.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.368)
